name: 3'-hydroxyflavanone,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (5'-hydroxylating)
definition: 3'-Hydroxyflavanone + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 3',5'-Dihydroxyflavanone + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the second step of two-step reaction (see R10069, R07369+R07370)
